name: Örnöga: Idle
summary:
Örnöga is an idle game where your character fights and explores on their own, requiring no manual input. However, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can take control by using character-specific skills and controlling your hero. While playing actively isn’t necessary, it can give you an edge in tough battles and speed up your progress.

Level up and earn Stat Points to distribute across seven unique Stats, customizing your build to suit your playstyle.

Level up spells from four distinct elements, mastering their power to enhance your abilities in battle.
